about_the_game:
Lilies is a 10 acre venue that is as beautiful as its residents and is named after the abundance of lilies on the surface of the lake. This venue is known for its big fish and provides a challenge with lots of weed present and the stock of fish being low. However, with every fish being of specimen size with Carp up to 50 lbs and Catfish to 100lbs the rewards are definitely there.

The highlights of this venue are:

  • Full of specimen sized fish
  • Abundance of lilies on the surface
  • 20 new boss fish and 10 new achievements
  • 11 different species of fish

The highlights of this venue are:

name: Euro Fishing: Lilies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64bit / 8 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 1 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 460 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64bit / 8 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

short_description: Lilies is a 10 acre venue that is as beautiful as its residents and is named after the abundance of lilies on the surface of the lake. This venue is known for its big fish with Carp up to 50lbs and Catfish up to 100lbs.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support
